data.title: Good food
data.text:
The Birria served in this place is authentic of its Origen from Jalisco Mexico. It is a Birrieria, meaning it pretty much serves Birria only
. The downside is that there are no options of side dishes such as rice or beans, at least that's what the server told us. She stated "sorry, no sides" it took a while to be acknowledged and seated but the food was good.

data.title: A little taste of mexico
data.text:
This is a restaurant in Los Angeles a few minutes from LAX airport. 

Birria is in traditional Mexican dish. Mainly made of goat meat. 

Handmade tortillas is a nice touch. 

Rich sauce inundates the soft meat. 
The meat can be garnished and flavored with chopped onions, cilantro and lime juice. For extra kick
You can add hot sauce.

data.title: Got Goat???
data.text:
This place is of the hook the birria is so good and tasty and to give it a extra good flavor hand made corn tortillas can't go wrong with this place and to finish it off try the jericallas just like the ones my auntie used to make love this place every time we go to Los Angeles we make a stop at this place. 
VIVA LA BIRRIA!!!!!

data.title: Excelente
data.text: Vivo en Mexico y esta es una de las mejores que probado en toda mi vida,  está preparada de manera que tiene muy poca o casi nada de grasa hacen tortillas de maíz muy buenas y hay postres mexicanos y refrescos mexicanos también
